title: looking for duo partner (s)
body:
i am a decent player but i cannot get out of this elo fcking hell. im looking for other decent players with the same problem who can play every day. 
if you wish to join me in digging out of the pit of hell that is bronze add me * KingVascal. dont bother replying to this i wont check it so just add me
if you have skype that would be awsome but idm either way
bring a big shovel lads got  alot of fat noobs to tunnel through

replies.body: hello i will duo with you,  I main teemo adc and jungle.  I also play bard mid and top.  im bronze 3 but im definitly gold in skil, im stuck in elo hell too. :)(: {{champion:17}}
